attributes.additional_details: Women who suffer from Post-Natal Depression need more support and help.  We need a support network of volunteers of women who have either been through it or have helped someone through it and can spot the signs.  Women need someone to be there for them and not have to go looking for help because they wont.  there are too many women suffering in silence and it is a very misunderstood illness.  These women need help.

rejection.details: Please see: Post Natal Depression Support Groups
